column4: i ran into problems with vmware 7.1 on ubuntu 10.10 - found some sketchy patch on the internet (don't have link) that fixed it - http://paste.ubuntu.com/546654/
thanks, but this patch need vmware installed and I cannot install vmware
that patch allowed me to install vmware...
this patch applies to /usr/lib/vmware/modules/source/${mod}.tar, but vmware is not installed, so I have not /usr/lib/vmware/modules/source/${mod}.tar in my system, so I cannot apply patch
